full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 749 Filed 08/10/22 Page 195 of 236 1099 LC3Cmax7 Parkinson - cross testimony about this, so I'm just connecting -- THE COURT: True, but that doesn't (indiscernible overlapping speech) under the rules of evidence. MR. EVERDELL: Fair enough. BY MR. EVERDELL: Q. But you did learn who it was eventually, right? A. True. Q. One more question before we get to the search that we talked about on your direct. Before you met Mr. Epstein in connection with the burglary investigation in October of 2003, I believe you had seen him jogging around Palm Beach before then; is that right? A. No, I think that was after, because I didn't know who he was. I had only been on the force eight months, so I really had no knowledge of him. Never heard the name until the burglary. It's true, I saw him jogging, we'd wave to each other, but really prior to the burglary, I had no idea who it was. Q. Understood. Let's go ahead and talk about the search; all right? A. Yes. Q. So now I am fast forwarding two years and 15 days to October 20th, 2005; correct? A. Correct. Q. And that's the day that you helped execute a search warrant SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300 DOJ-OGR-00018296
